amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to cut the Rural Business Cooperative Service Rural Business Program Account by 50% from FY23 enacted.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Rural Business- Cooperative Service Program by $25,715,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 68 - 362 (Roll no. 413).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 68 - 362 (Roll no. 413).
